author: Frankula
name: Lo-Fi
description:
Original Cinnamon theme that comes in four different styles:
Lo-Fi Opaque Regular Panel
Lo-Fi Opaque Void Panel
Lo-Fi Glass Regular Panel
Lo-Fi Glass Void Panel
This theme is thoroughly indexed, by application-styling and by commented lines, and contains many extra stylings for apps; also included are matching Metacity and wallpaper in red, gray, blue, and green.
